system

Class Master

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • system.Master
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Client2Master, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, Worker2Master

    public class Master
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements Worker2Master, Client2Master
    The Class Master.
    Author:
